オプション1:
Star Man drank all the rainwater he could find nearby.
Still, it wasn't enough to quench his thirst.
(Maybe it was just the sunlight reflecting off the waves...)

オプション1: Suddenly, a sharp pain shot through his stomach.
Star Man clutched his belly and dropped to the ground.
His whole body trembled as the pain intensified.
Was it something in the water?
He lay there, groaning, trying to endure.
